General.Name: Solarvest Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Solarvest Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, provides engineering, procurement, construction, and commissioning solutions for solar photovoltaic systems to residential, commercial, and industrial properties in Malaysia, the Philippines, Taiwan, Vietnam, Singapore, Indonesia, and Thailand. It constructs solar photovoltaics (PV) systems, such as rooftop, large-scale ground-mounted, and floating solar PV systems. The company also provides operations and maintenance services for solar PV systems. In addition, it owns, operates, and maintains a 1MW solar PV plant located in Pokok Sena, Kedah. Solarvest Holdings Berhad was founded in 2012 and is based in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
